name: EBS Merchant Gateway For eShop
author: L.CH.RAJKUMAR

sections.description:
EBS Merchant Gateway for eShop plugin acts as an add-on plugin for “eShop WordPress plugin” which adds up the additional merchant gateway namely “EBS” for all INDIAN & US currency based country eShop powered site owners..

Features:

  • Uses secured payment processing system which is provided by EBS Gateway.
  • Uses “Account ID”, “Secret Key”, “Return/Success URL” for performing the payment to the correct merchant.
  • Accepts INR “INDIAN RUPEE” currency only for doing online payment(s).
  • Have TEST & LIVE mode of operations for the Gateway to check payment work flow correctly.

Bug/Error Fix:

  • Fixed the file path missing problem by changing URL(s) of whole plugin.

Support

  • Available via GMAIL(“l.ch.rajkumar@gmail.com”) & SKYPE(“rajkumar.lch”)
sections.installation:
1. Download the Plugin by searching in WP Plugins repository.
  2. Upload the “ebs-merchant-gateway-for-eshop” folder to your site’s ‘wp-content/plugins’ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin using Activate button.
  4. Proceed for ESHOP settings page & proceed further by filling details about your EBS account & enjoy.
sections.faq:
• Does this plugin supports all versions of ESHOP?

Currently this plugin is tested with latest ESHOP WP Plugin version & it is running successfully.

  • Should I register with EBS Gateway & get verified before using this payment option in my eShop powered store?

Yes.

  • Can I expect any assistance for this plugin from you?

Yes, you can contact me at “l.ch.rajkumar@gmail.com” or Skype me at ” tech.transformerz ” at any time. I’ll assist you.

  • Why this plugin is not working in my store?

This plugin works only when ESHOP WP Plugin is installed & activated in your store. So, pre-check whether your store is using ESHOP or not & then proceed further.
